detail_desc: Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
